resources.string: နောင်အင်းလေး
ဝါကြီးထပ်နှစ်
ဝါငယ်ထပ်နှစ်
ခရဇ်သက္ကရာဇ်
မြန်မာသက္ကရာဇ်
The app\'s been made possible to shine to its best by leveraging the following open source projects and software.
Myanmar Calendar Calculations by Ko Yan Naing Aye

Boam Boan for awesome fotos
James Pu for cool app icon
Saw Phyu for general support and
last but not least,Ko Kyaw Thein for general support and play store account to host the app.

In version 0.1.1 (Ibis) release, lollipop incompatibility issue is fixed. Some market day Photos are removed for the sake of app\'s size. Status bar is re-designed to meet the material design guide lines.\n\n Any bug report or feature requests are thankfully welcome.

The only thing we ask is that you not re-sell the icons themselves.

string-array.name: feature_list_0_1_1
string-array.item: Removed some market days photos to reduce app\'s size.
Redesigned status bar according to Material design guide lines.
